alerts.underReviewDescription: We're reviewing your information. This typically takes 1-3 business days.
alerts.actionRequiredDescription: There are issues with your submission that need to be addressed. Please check the verification tab.
alerts.approvedDescription: Your profile has been verified successfully. You now have full access to all services.
